title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Through Drama Learning Based on Digital Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems utilizing local cultural cases in a digital simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose three or more methods for applying mathematical concepts to real-world job situations through culture-based drama learning scenarios.
Learners can achieve over 90% interaction frequency with peer learners and share problem-solving processes through VR-based collaborative activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
